The Dopler Shift

def heightToDelay(height,elevationAngle,reciever):
    path = 2*height/math.sin(math.radians(elevationAngle))
    delay = path*(reciever.CA_chip_frequency/reciever.speedOfLight)
    return(delay)

$$ \frac{v}{c}*f $$
